nodes.text: Kinyen was an agriworld located in the galaxy's Expansion Region. on the Corellian Trade Spine. It along with the planet Malastare was the homeworld of the Gran, including both Philo and Kharrus, who served as the world's senators within the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars.
The planet was notable for its many peaceful farming settlements, such as the Kemalo Farming Cluster. Their bountiful produce was sold and distributed to many parts of the galaxy, including Batuu.
